mapper.delete: delete from basket where id = #{id} and pno = #{pno}
mapper.update: update basket set cnt = #{cnt}, address = #{address}, size = #{size} , totalPrice = #{price} * #{cnt} where id = #{id} and pno = #{pno}
mapper.insert: insert into basket (id , num , price , cnt , totalPrice , size , color , proName ,address) values (#{id} , #{num} , #{price} , #{cnt} , #{price} * #{cnt} , #{size} , #{color} , #{proName} , #{address})
